name: CandleLight VR PC
description:
CandleLight VR is a game based on a meditation minigame for the Wii Fit. The entire minigame is to try and keep still on your Wii Fit Board. CandleLight VR, however, takes a little more of a creepier twist on it.

It is recommended to play this game at night with headphones on for the best experience. It is also recommended that you sit down during the experience.

This is a physicological horror experience. Anything you see or hear in the game is all in your head!
